page.title: 02Geog., Ecology & Environment
page.content: Most of the land in our block is natural grassland and "whins". The Links make up most of the natural grassland and it is here that two golf courses and a pitch and putt course have been laid out. A caravan site also occupies a large area of it. Erosion of the "Bents" is a problem, and work is being carried out to try to halt the damage done by holiday makers who have made breaks in the natural barrier and have eroded the grass. Huge "blowholes" have appeared and are a real menace to the rest of the dunes. Glaxo has also caused some erosion problems by levelling off a part of the dunes but they and the local Environment Officer are sure that with fencing and the planting of marram grass the damage will be made good.
